metaTags.metaDescription: Cloudflare Access secures employee and contractors with a faster, safer VPN alternative. Free for up to 50 users. See why IDC named us a Leader.

relatedBlades.htmlContent: Cloudflare named in 2024 Gartner Magic Quadrant for SV-SASE. Announcement >

relatedBlades.title: Cloudflare Access
relatedBlades.subtitle: Fast, reliable Zero Trust Network Access (ZTNA)
relatedBlades.copy: Access verifies context (like identity and device posture) to secure access across your entire environment  no VPN required.

columnContent.title: Improve team productivity
columnContent.description: Make on-premises applications as easy to use as SaaS apps. ZTNA [reduces remote access support tickets by 80%](https://cfl.re/ztna-product-overview) compared to a VPN.

columnContent.title: Simplify management
columnContent.description: Simplify the setup and operation of ZTNA with robust software connectors and unified Zero Trust policies.

columnContent.title: Eliminate lateral movement
columnContent.description: Shrink your attack surface by enforcing context-based, least-privilege access policies for every resource.

columnContent.title: Scale Zero Trust effortlessly
columnContent.description: Shield critical applications and high-risk user groups first  then expand cloud-native ZTNA to protect your entire business.

relatedBlades.title: Manage user access across your entire environment
relatedBlades.copy:
Cloudflare Access verifies and secures employee and third-party access across all of your self-hosted, SaaS, and non-web applications, helping mitigate risk and ensure a smooth user experience.

It checks granular context like identity and device posture for every request to provide fast, reliable access across your business.
relatedBlades.learnMoreText: Learn more in our ZTNA product overview

relatedBlades.title: Learn how Access works within Cloudflare's SASE platform

columnContent.title: Cloudflare named in 2024 Gartner Magic Quadrant for Single-Vendor SASE
columnContent.description: We believe this recognition is a testament to Cloudflare's "light branch, heavy cloud" architecture and its ability to help global, cloud-minded enterprises accelerate their network modernization.

columnContent.title: Cloudflare a Strong Performer in The Forrester Wave: Security Service Edge Solutions, Q1 2024
columnContent.description: Cloudflare received the highest score in the global network criterion. We believe this recognition validates our commitment to build SASE "the right way," converging network and security services on a composable, programmable connectivity cloud.

columnContent.title: Cloudflare named a "Leader" in 2023 KuppingerCole Leadership Compass for SASE
columnContent.description: Through its 2023 SASE market analysis, KuppingerCole Analysts AG cited several Cloudflare strengths such as our large globally distributed presence and sophisticated traffic acceleration, massive backbone capacity, 100% uptime guarantee, and innovative Remote Browser Isolation.

content.value: "Cloudflare Access was a game-changer for Bitso. It made Zero Trust much easier. We now manage access to internal resources more efficiently, ensuring the right people have the right level of access to the right resources, regardless of their location, device or network."

relatedBlades.title: Cloudflare Access provides simple, secure user access to your internal resources  without a VPN

columnContent.title: Augment / replace your VPN
columnContent.description: Offload critical applications for better security and an improved user experience.

columnContent.title: Manage third-party access
columnContent.description: Authenticate third-party users (like contractors) with clientless options, social identity providers, and more.

columnContent.title: Empower developers
columnContent.description: Ensure privileged technical users can access critical infrastructure  without performance trade-offs.

relatedBlades.htmlContent: Explore use cases

relatedBlades.description: Helping organizations worldwide progress toward Zero Trust

relatedBlades.title: Access control features across full Zero Trust platform

plan.name: Free Plan
plan.description: Best for teams under 50 users or enterprise proof-of-concept tests.

plan.entryTitle: Zero Trust Q4 - Pay as you go
plan.name: Pay-as-you-go
plan.description: Best for teams over 50 users solving narrow SSE use cases and do not require enterprise support services.

plan.name: Contract Plan
plan.description: Best for organizations building toward a full-featured SSE or SASE deployment that also desire maximum support.

features.name: Application connector software
features.description:
Securely connects resources to Cloudflare without a publicly routable IP address. Does not require VM infrastructure and has no throughput limitations.

[See tech docs >](https://developers.cloudflare.com/cloudflare-one/connections/connect-networks/)

features.name: Device client (agent) software
features.description:
Securely and privately sends traffic from end user devices to Cloudflare's global network. Enables capabilities like building device posture rules or enforcing filtering policies anywhere. Self-enroll or deploy via MDM.

[See tech docs >](https://developers.cloudflare.com/cloudflare-one/connections/connect-devices/warp/)

features.description:
ZTNA provides granular identity- and context-based access to all your internal self-hosted, SaaS, and non-web (e.g., SSH) resources.

[See tech docs >](https://developers.cloudflare.com/cloudflare-one/policies/access/)

features.description:
CASB continuously monitors SaaS apps at rest to detect potential data exposure due to misconfigurations or weak posture findings.

[See tech docs >](https://developers.cloudflare.com/cloudflare-one/applications/scan-apps/)

features.name: Data Loss Prevention (DLP)
features.description:
DLP detects sensitive data in transit and at rest across web, SaaS and private apps with controls or remediation guides to stop leakage or exposure.

[See tech docs >](https://developers.cloudflare.com/cloudflare-one/policies/data-loss-prevention/)

features.name: Remote Browser Isolation (RBI)
features.description:
RBI layers additional threat defense and data protection controls across browsing activities by running all browser code on Cloudflare's global network.

[See tech docs >](https://developers.cloudflare.com/cloudflare-one/policies/browser-isolation/)

Use DoH mode to only enforce DNS filtering policies, or use proxy mode to filter traffic only to specific apps.
